casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terrence Lowell HYMAN 245A08-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2017 Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney General, Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of NC. Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hyman, Terrence Lowell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of December 2017 by State of NC to Amend Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2017."
